tweets.text: It reminds me of the Hell of Mordor with the festering soul of Sauron brooding within. It was very small people, friendship, determination, a certain amount of providence that ended that. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #LOTR @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/ZQTBrsS8SA

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Oh Clare that's like an advert for @RedIndustries2 Looks pristine & well managed doesn't it when a stone's throw away it looks like the cesspit from hell. Well done for the sabotage, who are you actually working for us who breathe in toxic fumes daily or RI? @StinkStopthe

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 oh don't bother we know it will be a slap on the wrist for them , the community wants it closed . Your boss @JamesBevanEA has been told that it should be to the communities satisfaction , therefore it should be closed ! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #walleysQuarry

Would you trust the doctors at Public Health England? I certainly wouldn‚Äôt after Dr Richard Harling @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC says it‚Äôs absolutely fine for children to live here with this level of exposure to landfill fumes @Cap_it_off @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency https://t.co/BoT1y1KXu1
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 üòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ . oh sorry were you serious ? Somehow we don't believe you @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 We were all gassed out again last night, it‚Äôs needs closing down. You said you have never dealt with anything like this, the only way to deal with it is take there permits off them let us breath and live happily in our homes again

@EnvAgencyMids how the hell have you let @RedIndustries2 get away with a bond so low it won't cover site restoration of #WalleysQuarry , now you're scared of them going bankrupt too . you really aren't fit for purpose . @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You need to take core samples dear Ms Dinnis. The filling has been done too fast and the capping layers have not been done properly. Some sheeting isnt going to do the trick. Plus the DEADLINE IS TODAY !!!
@RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk #StopTheStink https://t.co/qklfE552iq

We need to start thinking beyond the @EnvAgency Nothing @ClareDinnisEA has said provides any assurance they will put a stop to this & when. If anything I feel less assured than before as they‚Äôre clearly a toothless organisation @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/RQFJr4Y0MV

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 I have just drove from our pharmacy 12 miles away and within 7 miles you could smell it until I arrived back in stinky Dale. Absolutely disgraceful reaction from your team. You couldn't care less. !!!
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Are you joking? It absolutely stinks today miles away from the landfill and it will stink tomorrow. For crying out loud close it down. #StopTheStink

@hopeternalall @StinkStopthe I have really struggled today, it is severely impacting on my ability to concentrate and function and led to some upset this morning, when the stink remained. This cannot continue @EnvAgency

@SianieRoo @ClareDinnisEA When you go to the landfill after the midnight deadline @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency take a spade with you. You will soon find out where the stench is coming from @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ZmYZgYY0nl

¬†

Landfill gases filling the house again last night. Everywhere stinks. Hubby woke up feeling dizzy. Usual reporting to Env Agency and Council. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 EA this goes beyond a bit of tarp & a barrow full of soil, this is an environmental disaster on a catastrophic scale & needs addressing immediately as an emergency. This landfill is totally out of control & we are being systematically poisoned on a daily basis, close it down üò°

My kitchen, 2 miles away and up a hill from #WalleysQuarry, in Keele has suddenly been filled with the smell of landfill! @EnvAgencyMids sort it out! This is now a human rights issue! People can't enjoy their own homes. #StopTheStink

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh

urls.title: #EndSewagePollution-SewageBill ‚Ä¢ Surfers Against Sewage
urls.description: Philip Dunne MP is the main sponsor of this Bill and will be there when the Bill is debated. How about telling your friends and family to contact their MP? Your MP has already pledged their support for the Bill but we really need them to show up for our rivers and attend the second reading debate. It looks like your MP does not make an email address available to their constituents. You can write to them at their postal address. Find the details on your MP's parliamentary page. Thank you for supporting The
